GE07bhg4c15u:3: chandāṃsi yasya parṇāni yas taṃ veda sa veda-vit //1//

GE07bhg4c15u:8_0: na caikānta-bhaktiḥ jñānaṃ cāviraktasya sambhavatīti vairāgya-pūrvakaṃ jñānam upadeṣṭu-kāmaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:8_1: prathamaṃ tāvat sārdha-ślokābhyāṃ saṃsāra-svarūpaṃ vṛkṣa-rūpakālaṅkāreṇa varṇayan
GE07bhg4c15u:9: ūrdhvam uttamaḥ kṣarākṣarābhyām utkṛṣṭaḥ puruṣottamo mūlaṃ yasya tam /
GE07bhg4c15u:10: adha iti tato 'rvācīnāṃ kāryopādhayo hiraṇyagarbhādayo gṛhyante /
GE07bhg4c15u:11: te tu śākhā iva śākhā yasya tam /
GE07bhg4c15u:12: vinaśvaratvena śvaḥ prabhāta-paryantam api na sthāsyatīti viśvāsānarhatvād aśvatthaṃ prāhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:16: chandāṃsi vedā yasya parṇāni dharmādharma-pratipādana-dvāreṇa cchāyā-sthānīyaiḥ karma-phalaiḥ saṃsāra-vṛkṣasya sarva-jīvāśrayaṇīyatva-pratipādanāt parṇa-sthānīyā vedāḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:17: yas tam evambhūtam aśvatthaṃ veda sa eva vedārtha-vit /
GE07bhg4c15u:22: vedoktaiḥ karmabhiḥ sevyatām āpāditaś ca ity etāvān eva hi vedārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:23: ata evaṃ vidvān vedavid iti stūyate //1//
GE07bhg4c15u:25: pūrvādhyāye bhagavtā saṃsāra-bandha-hetūn guṇān vyākhyāya teṣām atyayena brahma-bhāvo mokṣo mad-bhajanena labhyata ity uktam --
GE07bhg4c15u:27: sa guṇān samatītyaitān brahma-bhūyāya kalpate // [Gītā 14.26] iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:28: tatra manuṣyasya tava bhakti-yogena kathaṃ brahma-bhāva ity āśaṅkāyāṃ svasya brahma-rūpatā-jñāpanāya sūtra-bhūto 'yaṃ śloko bhagavatoktaḥ -
GE07bhg4c15u:30: śāśvatasya ca dharmasya sukhasyaikāntikasya ca //[Gītā 14.27] iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:32: bhagavataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇasya hi tattvaṃ jñātvā tat-prema-bhajanena guṇātītaḥ san brahma-bhāvaṃ katham āpnuyāl loka iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:33_0: tatra brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham ity ādi bhagavad-vacanam ākarṇya mama tulyo manuṣyo
GE07bhg4c15u:33_1: 'yaṃ katham evaṃ vadatīti vismayāviṣṭam apratibhayā lajjayā ca kiṃcid api praṣṭum
GE07bhg4c15u:33_2: aśaknuvan tam arjunam ālakṣya kṛpayā sva-svarūpaṃ vivakṣuḥ śrī-bhagavān uvāca ūrdhveti /
GE07bhg4c15u:34_0: tatra viraktasyaiva saṃsārād bhagavat-tattva-jñāne 'dhikāro nānyatheti pūrvādhyāyoktaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:35: ūrdhvam utkṛṣṭaṃ mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ sva-prakāśa-paramānanda-rūpatvena nityatvena ca brahma /
GE07bhg4c15u:36: atahvordhvaṃ sarva-saṃsāra-bādhe 'py abādhitaṃ sarva-saṃsāra-bhramādhiṣṭhānaṃ brahma tad eva māyayā mūlam asyety ūrdhva-mūlam /
GE07bhg4c15u:37: adha ity arvācīnāḥ kāryopādhayo hiraṇyagrabhādyā gṛhyante /
GE07bhg4c15u:38: te nānā-dik-prasṛtatvāc chākhā iva śākhā asyety adhaḥ-śākham /
GE07bhg4c15u:39: āśu-vināśitvena na śvo 'pi sthāteti viśvāsānarham aśvattham māyā-mayaṃ saṃsāra-vṛkṣam avyayam anādy-ananta-dehādi-santānāśrayam ātma-jñānam antareṇānucchedyam
GE07bhg4c15u:40: anantam avyayam āhuḥ śrutayaḥ smṛtayaś ca /

GE07bhg4c15u:42: arvāñco nikṛṣṭāḥ kāryopādhayo mahad-ahaṅkāra-tanmātrādayo vā śākhā asyety arvāk-śākha ity adhaḥ-śākha-pada-samānārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:51: etac chittvā ca bhittvā ca jñānena paramāsinā /
GE07bhg4c15u:52: tataś cātma-gatiṃ prāpya tasmān nāvartate punaḥ //
GE07bhg4c15u:54: avyaktam avyākṛtaṃ māyopādhikaṃ brahma tad eva mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ tasmāt prabhavo yasya sa tathā /
GE07bhg4c15u:57: saṃsārasya ca buddheḥ sakāśān nānā-vidhāḥ pariṇāmā bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c15u:58: tena sādharmyeṇa buddhir eva skandhas tan-mayas tat-pracuro 'yam /
GE07bhg4c15u:59: indriyāṇām antarāṇi cchidrāṇy eva koṭarāṇi yasya sa tathā /
GE07bhg4c15u:60: mahānti bhūtāny ākāśādīni pṛthivy-antāni vividhāḥ śākhā yasya viśākhaḥ stambho yasyeti vā /
GE07bhg4c15u:64: etad brahma-vanam asya brahmaṇo jīva-rūpasya bhogyaṃ vananīyaṃ sambhajanīyam iti vanaṃ brahma sākṣivad ācarati
GE07bhg4c15u:65: na tv etat kṛtena lipyata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:66: etad brahma-vanaṃ saṃsāra-vṛkṣātmakaṃ chittvā ca bhittvā cāhaṃ,
GE07bhg4c15u:67: brahmāsmīty atidṛḍha-jñāna-khaḍgena sa-mūlaṃ nikṛtyety arthaḥ ātma-rūpāṃ gatiṃ prāpya tasmād ātma-rūpān mokṣān nāvartata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:69: atra ca gaṅgā-taraṅga-nudyamānottuṅga-tat-tīra-tiryaṅ-nipatitam ardhonmūlitaṃ mārutena mahāntam aśvattham upamānīkṛtya jīvantam iyaṃ rūpaka-kalpaneti draṣṭavyam /
GE07bhg4c15u:71: yasya māyā-mayasyāśvatthasya cchandāṃsi cchādanāt tattva-vastu-prāvaraṇāt saṃsāra-vṛkṣa-rakṣaṇād vā karma-kāṇḍāni ṛg-yajuḥ-sāma-lakṣaṇāni parṇānīva parṇāni /
GE07bhg4c15u:72: yathā vṛkṣasya parirakṣaṇāthāni parṇāni bhavanti tathā saṃsāra-vṛkṣasya parirakṣaṇāthāni karma-kāṇḍāni dharmādharmaa-tad-dhetu-phala-prakāśanārthatvāt teṣām /
GE07bhg4c15u:73: yas taṃ yathā-vyākhyātaṃ sa-mūlaṃ saṃsāra-vṛkṣaṃ māyā-mayam aśvatthaṃ veda jānāti sa veda-vit karma-brahmākhya-vedārtha-vit sa evety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:76: sa ca saṃsāra-vṛkṣaḥ svarūpeṇa vinaśvaraḥ pravāha-rūpeṇa cānantaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:77: sa ca vedoktaiḥ karmabhiḥ sicyate brahma-jñānena ca cchidyata ity etāvān eva hi vedārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:78: yaś ca vedārthavit sa eva sarva-vid iti sa-mūla-vṛkṣa-jñānaṃ stauti sa vedavid iti //1//
GE07bhg4c15u:81: uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti pañcadaśe kathā //
GE07bhg4c15u:86: tatra tava manuṣyasya bhakti-yogena kathaṃ brahma-bhāva iti cet,
GE07bhg4c15u:87: satyam ahaṃ manuṣya eva kintu brahmaṇo 'pi tasya pratiṣṭhā paramāśraya ity asya sūtra-rūpasya vṛtti-sthānīyo 'yaṃ pañcadaśādhyāya ārabhyate /
GE07bhg4c15u:88: tatra sa guṇān samatītya ity uktam iti guṇamyo 'yaṃ saṃsāraḥ kaḥ,
GE07bhg4c15u:89: kuto vāyaṃ pravṛttas tad-bhaktyā saṃsāram atikrāmyan jīvo vā kaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:90: brahma-bhūyāya kalpate ity uktaṃ brahma vā kiṃ /
GE07bhg4c15u:91: brahmaṇaḥ pratiṣṭhā tvaṃ vā ka ity-ādy-apekṣāyāṃ prathamam atiśayokty-alaṅkāreṇa saṃsāro 'yam adbhuto 'śvattha-vṛkṣa iti varṇayati /
GE07bhg4c15u:92: ūrdhve sarva-lokopari-tale satya-loke prakṛti-bījottha-prathama-praroha-rūpa-mahat-tattvātmakaś caturmukha eka eva mūlaṃ yasya tam /
GE07bhg4c15u:94_1: tāḥ śākhā yasya tam aśvatthaṃ dharmādi-caturvarga-sādhakatvād aśvattham uttamaṃ vṛkṣam /
GE07bhg4c15u:95: śleṣeṇa bhaktimatāṃ na śvaḥ sthāsyatīty aśvatthaṃ naṣṭa-prāyam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:97: chandāṃsi vāyavyaṃ śvetam ālabheta bhūmikām aindram ekādaśaka-pālaṃ nirvapet prajākāmaḥ ity ādyāḥ karma-pratipādakā vedāḥ saṃsāra-vardhakatvāt parṇāni /
GE07bhg4c15u:100: tathā ca ūrdhva-mūlo 'vāk-śākha eṣo 'śvatthaḥ sanātanaḥ [KaṭhU 2.3.1] iti kaṭha-vallī-śrutiḥ //1//
GE07bhg4c15u:103: ahaṃ sarvottamaḥ śrīmān iti pañcadaśe smṛtam //
GE07bhg4c15u:104: pūrvatra vijñānānandasyautpattika-guṇāṣṭakasyāpi jīvasya karma-rūpānādi-vāsanānuguṇena bhagavat-saṅkalpena prakṛti-guṇa-saṅgaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:105_0: sa ca bahuvidhas tad-atyayaś ca bhagavad-bhakti-śiraskena viveka-jñānena bhavet tasmiṃś
GE07bhg4c15u:105_1: ca sati samprāpta-nija-svarūpo jīvo bhagavantam āśritya prmodo sarvadā tasmiṃs tiṣṭhatīty uktam /
GE07bhg4c15u:106: atha tad-viveka-jñāna-sthairya-karaṃ vairāgyaṃ jīvasya bhajanīya-bhagavad-aṃśatvaṃ bhagavataḥ svetara-sarvottamatvaṃ cokteṣv artheṣūpayogāya pañcadaśe 'smin varṇyate /
GE07bhg4c15u:107: tatra tāvad guṇa-viracitasya saṃsārasya vairāgya-vaiccedyatvāt saṃsāraṃ vṛkṣatvena vairāgyaṃ ca śastratvena rūpayan varṇayati bhagavān -- ūrdhvamūlam ity ādibhis tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:110: adhaḥ satya-lokād arvācīneṣu svar-bhuvar-bhūr-lokeṣu deva-gandharva-kinnarāsura-yakṣa-rākṣasa-manuṣya-paśu-pakṣi-kīṭa-pataṅga-sthāvarāntā nānādik-prasṛtatvāc chākhā yasya tam /
GE07bhg4c15u:112: tādṛśena viveka-jñānena vinā nivṛtter abhāvād avyayaṃ pravāha-rūpeṇa nityaṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c15u:119_0: yasya saṃsārāśvatthasya chandāṃsi karmākarma-pratipādakāni śruti-vākyāni vāsanāā-rūpa-tan-nidāna-vardhakatvāt
GE07bhg4c15u:119_1: parṇāni prāhus tāni cchandāṃsi vāyavyaṃ śvetam ālabheta bhūti-kāma aindram ekādaśaka-pālaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:120: patrais tarur vardhate śobhate ca tam aśvatthaṃ yo veda yathoktaṃ jānāti sa eva veda-vit /
GE07bhg4c15u:121: vedaḥ khalu saṃsārasya vṛkṣatvaṃ chedyatvābhiprāyeṇāha tad-chedanopāyajño vedārthavid iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:130: teṣu ca ye duṣkṛtinas te 'dhaḥ paśv-ādi-yoniṣu prasṛtās tasya saṃsāra-vṛkṣasya śākhāḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:131: kiṃ ca, guṇaiḥ sattvādi-vṛttibhir jala-secanair iva yathāyathaṃ pravṛddhā vṛddhiṃ prāptāḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:132: kiṃ ca, viṣayā rūpādayaḥ pravālāḥ pallava-sthānīyā yāsāṃ tāḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:134: kiṃ ca, adhaś ca ca-śabdād ūrdhvaṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c15u:141: hi karma-kṣaye manuṣya-lokaṃ prāptānāṃ tat-tad-anurūpeṣu karmasu pravṛttir bhavati /
GE07bhg4c15u:142: tasminn eva hi karmādhikāro nānyeṣu lokeṣu /
GE07bhg4c15u:145: tasyaiva saṃsāra-vṛkṣasyāvayava-sambandhiny aparā kalpanocyate adhaś ceti /
GE07bhg4c15u:148: teṣu ye kapūya-caraṇā duṣkṛtinas te 'dhaḥ paśv-ādi-yoniṣu prasṛtā vistāraṃ gatāḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:149_0: ye tu ramaṇīya-caraṇāḥ sukṛtinas ta ūrdhvaṃ devādi-yoniṣu prasṛtā ato 'dhaś ca manuṣyatvād
GE07bhg4c15u:149_1: ārabhya viriñci-paryantam ūrdhvaṃ ca tasmād evārabhya satya-loka-paryantaṃ prasṛtās
GE07bhg4c15u:151: guṇaiḥ sattva-rajas-tamo bhir dehendriya-viṣayākāra-pariṇatair jala-secanair iva pravṛddhāḥ sthūlībhūtāḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:152: kiṃ ca, viṣayāḥ śabdādayaḥ pravālāḥ pallavā iva yāsāṃ saṃsāra-vṛkṣa-śākhānāṃ tās tathā śākhāgra-sthānīyābhir
GE07bhg4c15u:155_0: kiṃ ca, adhaś ca ca-śabdād ūrdhvaṃ ca mūlāny avāntarāṇi tat-tad-bhoga-janita-rāga-dveṣādi-vāsanā-lakṣaṇāni
GE07bhg4c15u:156: mukhyaṃ ca mūlaṃ brahmaiveti na doṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:158: karma dharmādharma-lakṣaṇam anubandhuṃ paścāj janayituṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni karmānubandhīni /
GE07bhg4c15u:159: kutra ? manuṣya-loke manuṣyaś cāsau lokaaś cety adhikṛto brāhmaṇyādi-viśiṣṭo deho manuṣya-lokas tasmin bāhulyena karmānubandhīni /
GE07bhg4c15u:162: adhaḥ paśv-ādi-yoniṣu ūrdhve devādi-yoniṣu prasṛtās tasya saṃsāra-vṛkṣasya guṇaiḥ sattvādi-vṛttibhir jala-sekair iva pravṛddhāḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:163: viṣayā śabdādayaḥ pravālāḥ pallava-sthānīyā yāsāṃ tāḥ /

GE07bhg4c15u:164_1: mūla-jaṭābhir avalambya sthitasya tasyāśvattha-vṛkṣasyāpi baṭa-vṛkṣasyeva śākhāsv
GE07bhg4c15u:164_2: api bāhyā jaṭāḥ santīty āha adhaś ceti /
GE07bhg4c15u:165: brahma-loka-mūlasyāpi tasyādhaś ca manuṣya-loke karmānubandhīni karmānulambīni mūlāny anusantatāni nirantaraṃ vistṛtāni bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c15u:166: karma-phalānāṃ yatas tato bhogānte punar manuṣya-janmany eva karmasu pravṛttāni bhavantīty arthaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c15u:168: tasyokta-lakṣaṇasya saṃsārāśvatthasya śākhā adha ūrdhvaṃ ca prasṛtāḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:169: adho manuṣya-paśv-ādi-yoniṣu duṣkṛtair ūrdhvaṃ ca deva-gandharvādi-yoniṣu sukṛtair vistṛtāḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:170: guṇaiḥ sattvādi-vṛttibhir ambu-niṣekair iva pravṛddhāḥ sthaulya-bhājaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:171: viṣayāḥ śabda-sparśādayaḥ pravālāḥ pallavā yāsāṃ tāḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:172: śākhāgra-sthānīyābhiḥ śrotrādi-vṛttibhir yogād rāgādhiṣṭhānatvāc ca śabdādīnāṃ pallava-sthānīyatvam /
GE07bhg4c15u:173: tasyāśvatthasyādhaś ca śabdād ūrdhvaṃ cāvāntarāṇi mūlāny anusantatāni vistṛtāni santi /
GE07bhg4c15u:175: mukhyaṃ mūlaṃ tādṛk caturmukhas tat-tad-vāsanās tv avāntara-mūlāni nyagrodhasyaiva jaṭopajaṭāvṛndānīti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:176: tāni kīdṛśānīty āha manuṣya-loke karmānubandhīni yatas tataḥ karma-phala-bhogāvasāne sati punar manuṣya-loke karma-hetu-bhūtāni bhavantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:177: sa lokaḥ khalu karma-bhūmir iti prasiddham //2//
GE07bhg4c15u:181: nānto na cādir na ca saṃpratiṣṭhā /
GE07bhg4c15u:190: iha saṃsāre sthitaiḥ prāṇibhir asya saṃsāra-vṛkṣasya tathordhva-mūlatvādi-prakāreṇa rūpaṃ nopalabhyate /
GE07bhg4c15u:195: yasmād evambhūto 'yaṃ saṃsāra-vṛkṣo durucchedo 'narthakaraś ca tasmād enaṃ dṛḍhena vairāgyena śastreṇa cchitvā tattva-jñāne yatetety āha aśvattham enam iti sārdhena /
GE07bhg4c15u:198: tena śastreṇa dṛḍhena samyag-vicāreṇa cchittvā pṛthak-kṛtya //3//
GE07bhg4c15u:199: tata iti / tataś tasya mūla-bhūtaṃ tat padaṃ vastu parimārgitavyam anveṣṭavyaṃ /
GE07bhg4c15u:200: kīdṛśaṃ, yasmin gatā yat padaṃ prāptāḥ santo bhūyo na nivartanti nāvartanta ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:202: yata eṣā purāṇī cirantanī saṃsāra-pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā vistṛtā /
GE07bhg4c15u:203: tam eva cādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prapadye śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi /
GE07bhg4c15u:206_0: yas tv ayaṃ saṃsāra-vṛkṣo varṇita iha saṃsāre sthitaiḥ prāṇibhir asya saṃsāra-vṛkṣasya
GE07bhg4c15u:206_1: tathordhva-mūlatvādi tathā tena prakāreṇa rūpaṃ nopalabhyate svapna-marīcy-udaka-māyā-gandharva-nagaravan
GE07bhg4c15u:213_0: yasmād evaṃ-bhūto 'yaṃ saṃsāra-vṛkṣo durucchedaḥ sarvānartha-karaś ca tasmād anādy-ajñānena
GE07bhg4c15u:213_1: suvirūḍha-mūlam atyanta-baddha-mūlaṃ prāg-uktam aśvatthaṃ asaṅga-śastreṇa saṅgaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:213_2: spṛhāsaṅgaḥ saṅga-virodhi vairāgyaṃ putra-vitta-lokaiṣaṇā-tyāga-rūpaṃ tad eva śastraṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:215_0: tenāsaṅga-śastreṇa dṛḍhena paramātma-jñānautsukhya-dṛḍhīkṛtena punaḥ punar vivekābhyāsa-niśitena
GE07bhg4c15u:215_1: cchittvā sa-mūlam uddhṛtya vairāgya-śama-damādi-sampattyā sarva-karma-saṃnyāsaṃ kṛtvety etat //3 //
GE07bhg4c15u:216_0: tato gurum upasṛtya tato 'śvatthād ūrdhvaṃ vyavasthitaṃ tad vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ vedānta-vākya-vicāreṇa
GE07bhg4c15u:216_1: parimārgitavyaṃ mārgayitavyam anveṣṭavyaṃ so 'nveṣṭabhyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavya iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:217: tat padaṃ śravaṇādinā jñātavyam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:218: kiṃ tat padaṃ yasmin pade gatāḥ praviṣṭā jñānena na nivartanti nāvartante bhūyaḥ punaḥ saṃsārāya /
GE07bhg4c15u:220_0: ity āha - yaḥ pada-śabdenoktas tam eva cādyam ādau bhavaṃ puruṣaṃ yenedaṃ sarvaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:220_1: pūrṇaṃ taṃ puruṣu pūrṣu vā śayānaṃ prapadye śaraṇaṃ gato 'smīty evaṃ tad-eka-śaraṇatayā
GE07bhg4c15u:222: yato yasmāt puruṣāt pravṛttir māyā-maya-saṃsāra-vṛkṣa-pravṛttiḥ purāṇī cirantany anādir eṣā prasṛtā niḥsṛtaindrajālikād iva māyā-hasty-ādi
GE07bhg4c15u:225: kiṃ ceha manuṣya-loke 'sya rūpaṃ svarūpaṃ tathā sa-niścayaṃ nopalabhyate satyo 'yaṃ mithyāyaṃ nityo 'yam iti vādi-mata-vaividhyād iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:226: na cānto 'paryantatvān na cādir anāditvān na ca sampratiṣṭhāśrayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:227: kiṃ vādhāraḥ ko 'yam ity api nopalabhyate tattva-jñānābhāvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:228: yathā tathāyaṃ bhavatu jīva-mātra-duḥkhaika-nidānasyāsya chedakaṃ śastram asaṅgaṃ jñātvā tenaitaṃ chittvaivāsya mūla-tala-stho mahānidhir anveṣṭavya ity āha aśvattham iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:229: asaṅgo 'nāsaktiḥ sarvatra vairāgyam iti yāvat tena śastreṇa kuṭhāreṇa cchitvā svataḥ pṛthak-kṛtya tatas tasya mūla-bhūtaṃ tat-padaṃ vastu mahā-nidhi-rūpaṃ brahma parimārgitavyam /
GE07bhg4c15u:230: kīdṛśaṃ tad ata āha yasmin gatā yat padaṃ prāptāḥ santo bhūyo na nivartante na cāvartanta ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:232: āha yata eṣā purāṇī cirantanī saṃsāra-pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā vistṛtā tam evādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prapadye bhajāmīti bhaktyā anveṣṭavyam ity arthaḥ //3-4//
GE07bhg4c15u:233: baladevaḥ : na rūpam iti asyāśvatthasya rūpam iha manuṣya-loke tathā nopalabhyate yathordhva-mūlatvādi-dharmakatayā mayopavarṇitam /
GE07bhg4c15u:235: katham ayaṃ anartha-vrāta-jaṭilo vinaśyed iti na jñāyate /
GE07bhg4c15u:244: sāsmin deśe 'smin grāme nivasāmīty etāvad eva vijñāyata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:245_0: yasmād evaṃ durbodho 'nartha-vrate hetuś cāyam aśvatthas tasmāt sat-prasaṅga-labdha-vastu-yāthātmya-jñānenainam
GE07bhg4c15u:245_1: asaṅga-śastreṇa vairāgya-kuṭhāreṇa dṛḍhena vivekābhyāsa-niśitena cchitvā svataḥ pṛthak-kṛtya
GE07bhg4c15u:247: tad eva śastraṃ tad-abhilāṣa-nāśakatvāt suvirūḍha-mūlaṃ pūrvokta-rītyātyantaṃ baddha-mūlam /
GE07bhg4c15u:248: tataḥ saṃsārāśvattha-mūlād uparisthitaṃ tat padaṃ parimārgitavyaṃ mat-prasaṅga-labdhaiḥ śravaṇādibhiḥ sādhanair anveṣṭavyam /
GE07bhg4c15u:249: tat padaṃ kīdṛśaṃ tatrāha yasminn iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:250: yasmin gatās taiḥ sādhanair yat prāptā janās tato na nivartante svargād iva na patanti /
GE07bhg4c15u:252: yataḥ purāṇī cirantanīyaṃ jagat-pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā vistṛtā /
GE07bhg4c15u:253: tam eva cādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prapadye śaraṇaṃ vrajāmīti prapatti-pūrvakaiḥ śravaṇādibhis tan-mārgaṇam uktam /
GE07bhg4c15u:254: yo jagad-dhetur yat-porapattyā saṃsāra-nivṛttiḥ sa khalu kṛṣṇa eva ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavaḥ ity ādeḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:255: daivī hy eṣā guṇamayī ity ādeś ca tad-ukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:256: na tad bhāsayata ity ādinā vyaktībhāvitvāc ca //3-4//
GE07bhg4c15u:263: śrīdharaḥ : tat-prāptau sādhanāntarāṇi darśayann āha nirmāneti /
GE07bhg4c15u:273: parimārgaṇa-pūrvakaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ gacchatām aṅgāntarāṇy āha nirmāṇeti /
GE07bhg4c15u:279: jita-saṅga-doṣāḥ priyāpriya-saṃvidhāv api rāga-dveṣa-varjitā iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c15u:281: vinivṛtta-kāmā viśeṣeto niravaśeṣeṇa nivṛttāḥ kāmā viṣaya-bhogā yeṣāṃ te /
GE07bhg4c15u:283_1: sukha-duḥkha-nāmakaiḥ sukha-duḥkha-saṅgair iti pāṭhāntare sukha-duḥkhābhyāṃ saṅgaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:285: amūḍhā vedānta-pramāṇa-saṃjāta-samyag-jñāna-nivāritātmaājñānās tad avyayaṃ yathoktaṃ padaṃ gacchanti //5//
GE07bhg4c15u:287: tad-bhaktau satyāṃ janāḥ kīdṛśā bhūtvā taṃ padaṃ prāpnuvantīty apekṣāyām āha nirmāneti /
GE07bhg4c15u:288: adhyātma-nityā adhyātma-vicāro nity nitya-kartavyo yeṣāṃ te paramātmālocana-tat-parāḥ //5//
GE07bhg4c15u:289: baladevaḥ : tat-prapattau satyāṃ kīdṛśāḥ santas tat padaṃ prāpnuvantīty āha nirmāneti /
GE07bhg4c15u:293: adhyātmaṃ sva-parātma-viṣayako vimarśaḥ sa nityo nitya-kartavyo yeṣāṃ te /
GE07bhg4c15u:294: sukhādi-hetutvāt tat-saṃjñair dvandvaiḥ śītoṣṇādibhir vimuktās tat-sahiṣṇavaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:296: na tad bhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅko na pāvakaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:297: yad gatvā na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama //6//
GE07bhg4c15u:298: śrīdharaḥ : tad eva gantavyaṃ padaṃ viśinaṣṭi na tad iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:304: tad eva gantavyaṃ padaṃ viśinaṣṭi na tad iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:305: yad vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ gatvā yogino na nivartante tat padaṃ sarvāvabhāsana-śaktimān api sūryo na bhāsayate /
GE07bhg4c15u:306: sūryāsta-maye 'pi candro bhāsako dṛṣṭa ity āśaṅkyāha na śaśāṅkaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:307: sūryācandramasor ubhayor apy asta-maye 'gniḥ prakāśako dṛṣṭa ity āśaṅkyāha na pāvakaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:309: kutaḥ sūryādīnāṃ tatra prakāśanāsāmarthyam ity ata āha tad dhāma jyotiḥ svayaṃ-prakāśam ādiyādi-sakala-jaḍa-jyotir-avabhāsakaṃ paramaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ mama viṣṇoḥ svarūpātmakaṃ padam /
GE07bhg4c15u:310: na hi yo yad-bhāsyaḥ sa svabhāsakaṃ taṃ bhāsayitum īṣṭe /
GE07bhg4c15u:312: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:315: tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti // [KaṭhU 2.2.15] iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:316: etena tat padaṃ vedyaṃ na vā,
GE07bhg4c15u:317: ādye vedya-bhinna-veditṛ-sāpekṣatvena dvaitāpattir dvitīye sva-puruṣārthatvāpattir ity apāstam /
GE07bhg4c15u:318: avedyatve saty api svayam aparokṣatvāt tatrāvedyatvaṃ sūryādy-abhāsyatvenātroktaṃ,
GE07bhg4c15u:319: sarva-bhāsakatvena tu svayam aparokṣatvaṃ yad āditya-gataṃ teja ity atra vakṣyati /
GE07bhg4c15u:320: evam ubhābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ śruter dalad-vacaṃ vyākhyātam iti draṣṭavyam //6//
GE07bhg4c15u:322: tat padam eva kīdṛśam ity apekṣāyām āha na tad iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:324: tan mama paramaṃ dhāma sarvotkṛṣṭam ajaḍam atīndriyaṃ tejaḥ sarva-prakāśakam /
GE07bhg4c15u:326: tat paraṃ paramaṃ brahma sarvaṃ vibhajate jagat /
GE07bhg4c15u:327: mamaiva tad ghanaṃ tejo jñātum arhasi bhārata // [HV 2.114.12] iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:328: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:333: baladevaḥ : gantavyaṃ padaṃ viśiṣyan paricāyayati na tad iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:334: prapannā yad gatvā yato na nivartante /
GE07bhg4c15u:335: tan mamaiva dhāma svarūpaṃ paramaṃ śrīmat /
GE07bhg4c15u:336: sarvāvabhāsakā api sūryādayas tan na bhāsayanti prakāśayanti /
GE07bhg4c15u:337: na tatra sūryo bhāti ity ādi-śruteś ca /
GE07bhg4c15u:338: sūryādibhir aprakāśyas teṣāṃ prakāśakaḥ sva-prakāśaka-cid-vigraho lakṣmīpatir aham eva pada-śabda-bodhyaḥ prapannair labhya ity arthaḥ //6//
GE07bhg4c15u:343_0: śrīdharaḥ : nanu ca tvadīyaṃ dhāma prāptāḥ santo yadi na nivartante tarhi sati sampadya
GE07bhg4c15u:343_1: na viduḥ sati sampadyāmahe ity ādi śruteḥ suṣupti-pralaya-samaye tattva-prāptiḥ sarveṣām
GE07bhg4c15u:343_2: astīti ko nāma saṃsārī syād ity āśaṅkya saṃsāriṇaṃ darśayati mamaiveti pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:344: mamaivāṃśo yo 'yam avidyayā jīva-bhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ sarvadā saṃsāritvena prasiddhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:345: asau suṣupti-pralayayoḥ prakṛtau līnatayā sthitāni manaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ yeṣāṃ tānīndriyāṇi punar jīva-loke saṃsāropabhogārtham ākarṣati /
GE07bhg4c15u:347: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ saatyaṃ suṣupti-pralayayor api mad-aṃśatvāt sarvasāpi jīva-mātrasya mayi layād asty eva mat-prāptiḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:348: tathāpy avidyāyāvṛtasya sānuśayasya sa-prakṛtike mayi layaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:352: ataś ca punaḥ saṃsārāya nirgacchan avidvān prakṛtau līnatayā sthitāni svopādhi-bhūtānīndriyāṇi ākarṣati /
GE07bhg4c15u:355: jīvasya tu pāramārthikaṃ svarūpaṃ brahmaivety asakṛd āveditam /
GE07bhg4c15u:356: tad etat sarvaṃ pratipādyata uttareṇa granthena /
GE07bhg4c15u:357: tatra jīvasya brahma-rūpatvād ajñāna-nivṛttyā tat-svarūpaṃ prāptasya tato na pracyutir iti pratipādyate mamaivāṃśa [Gītā 15.7a] iti ślokārdhena /
GE07bhg4c15u:358: suṣuptau tu sarva-kārya-saṃskāra-sahitājñāna-sattvāt tataḥ punaḥ saṃsāro jīvasyeti manaḥ-ṣaṣṭhāni [Gītā 15.7b] iti ślokārdhena pratipādyate /
GE07bhg4c15u:359: tatas tasya vastuto 'saṃsāriṇo 'pi māyayā saṃsāraṃ prāptasya manda-matibhir deha-tādātmyaṃ prāpitasya dehād vyatirekaḥ pratipādyate śarīram [Gītā 15.8] ity ādinā ślokārdhena /
GE07bhg4c15u:360: śrotraṃ cakṣur [Gītā 15.9] ity ādinā tu yathāyathaṃ sva-viṣayeṣv indriyāṇāṃ pravartakasya tasya tebhyo vyatirekaḥ pratipādyate /
GE07bhg4c15u:362: kim iti sarve na paśyantīty āśaṅkāyāṃ viṣaya-vikṣipta-cittā darśana-yogyam api taṃ na paśyantīty uttaram ucyate utkrāmantam [Gītā 15.10a] ity ādinā ślokena /
GE07bhg4c15u:363: taṃ jñāna-cakṣuṣaḥ paśyantīti vivṛtaṃ yatanto yoginaḥ [Gītā 15.11a] iti ślokārdhena /
GE07bhg4c15u:364: vimūḍhā nānupaśyanti [Gītā 15.10b] ity etad vivṛtaṃ yatanto 'pi [Gītā 15.11b] iti ślokārdheneti pañcānāṃ ślokānāṃ saṅgatiḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:366: mamaiva paramātmano 'ṃśo niraṃśasyāpi māyayā kalpitaḥ sūryasyeva jale nabhasa iva ca ghaṭe mṛṣābhedavān aṃśa ivāṃśo jīva-loke saṃsāre,
GE07bhg4c15u:367: sa ca prāṇa-dhāraṇopādhinā jīva-bhūtaḥ kartā bhoktā saṃsaratīti mṛṣaiva prasiddhim upāgataḥ sanātano nitya upādhi-paricchede 'pi vastutaḥ paramātmatva-rūpatvāt /
GE07bhg4c15u:368: ato jñānādi-jñāna-nivṛttyā sva-svarūpaṃ brahma prāpya tato na nivartanta iti yuktam /
GE07bhg4c15u:369_0: evam-bhūto 'pi suṣuptāt katham āvartata ity āha - manaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni śrotra-tvak-cakṣū-rasana-ghrāṇākhyāni
GE07bhg4c15u:369_3: bhogārthaṃ karṣati kūrmo 'ṅgānīva prakṛter ajñānād ākarṣati viṣaya-grahaṇa-yogyatayāvirbhāvayatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:370: ato jñānād anāvṛttāv apy ajñānād āvṛttir nānupapanneti bhāvaḥ //7//
GE07bhg4c15u:372: tvad-bhaktyā saṃsāram atikrāmyan ta-pada-gāmī jīvaḥ ka ity apekṣāyām āha mamaivāṃśa iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:373: yad uktaṃ vārāhe svāṃśaś cātha vibhinnāṃśa iti dvedhāyam iṣyate /
GE07bhg4c15u:375: sanātano nityaḥ sa ca baddha-daśāyāṃ manaḥ eva ṣaṣṭhaṃ yeṣāṃ tānīndriyāṇi prakṛtāv upādhau sthitāni karṣati /
GE07bhg4c15u:376: mamaiva etānīti svīyatvābhimānena gṛhītāṃ pādārgala-śṛṅkhalām iva karṣati //7//
GE07bhg4c15u:377: baladevaḥ : nanu tvat-prapattyā yas tat-padaṃ yāti,
GE07bhg4c15u:378: sa jīvaḥ ka ity apekṣāyām āha mamaiveti /
GE07bhg4c15u:383: sa ca jīva-loke prapañce sthito manaḥ-ṣaṣṭhānīndriyāṇi śrotrādīni karṣati pādādi-śṛṅkhalā iva vahati /
GE07bhg4c15u:384: tāni kīdṛṃśīty āha prakṛti-sthāni prakṛti-vikāra-bhūtāhaṅkāra-kāryāṇīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:385: tatra manaḥ sāttvikāhaṅkārasya śrotrādikaṃ tu rājasāhaṅkārasya kāryam iti bodhyam /
GE07bhg4c15u:386_0: bhagavat-prapattyā prākṛta-karaṇa-hīno bhagaval-lokaṃ gatas tu bhāgavatair deha-karaṇair
GE07bhg4c15u:386_1: vibhūṣaṇair iva viśiṣṭo bhagavantaṃ saṃśrayan nivasatīti sūcyate -- sa vā eṣa brahma-niṣṭha
GE07bhg4c15u:386_2: idaṃ śarīraṃ martyam atisṛjya brahmābhisampadya brahmaṇā paśyati brahmaṇā
GE07bhg4c15u:387: śṛṇoti brahmaṇaivedaṃ sarvam anubhavati iti mādhyandināyana-śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:388: vasanti yatra puruṣāḥ sarve vaikuṇṭha-mūrtayaḥ [BhP 3.15.14] ity ādi smṛteś ca /
GE07bhg4c15u:390_0: yat tu ghaṭākāśavaj jalākāśavad vā jīve brahmaṇo 'ṃśo 'ntaḥ-karaṇenāvacchedāt tasmin
GE07bhg4c15u:390_1: pratibimba-nāśād vā ghaṭa-jala-nāśe tat-tad-ākāśasya śuddhākāśatvavad antaḥ-karaṇa-nāśe
GE07bhg4c15u:395: paricchedādi-vāda-dvayasya dehino 'smin yathā [Gītā 2.12] ity atra pratyākhyānāc ca /
GE07bhg4c15u:396: pratibimba-sādṛśyāt tu tattvaṃ mantavyam ambuvad adhikaraṇa-vinirṇayāt /
GE07bhg4c15u:397: tasmāt brahmopasarjanatvaṃ jīvasya brahmāṃśatvaṃ vidhu-maṇḍalasya śatāṃśaḥ śukra-maṇḍalam ity ādau dṛṣṭaṃ cedam eka-vastv-eka-deśatvaṃ cāṃśatvam āhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:398: brahma khalu śaktimad ekaṃ vastu brahma-śaktiḥ,
GE07bhg4c15u:399: itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parāṃ jīva-bhūtām [Gītā 7.5] iti pūrvokter atas tad eka-deśāt
GE07bhg4c15u:403: śarīraṃ yad avāpnoti yac cāpy utkrāmatīśvaraḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:407: yad yadā śarīrāntaraṃ karma-vaśād avāpnoti yataś ca śarīrād utkrāmatīśvaro dehādīnāṃ svāmī tadā pūrvasmāt śarīrād etāni gṛhītvā tac-charīrāntaraṃ samyag yāti /
GE07bhg4c15u:409: āśayāt sva-sthānāt kusumādeḥ sakāśāt gandhān gandhavataḥ sūkṣmān aṃśān gṛhītvā vāyur yathā gacchati tadvat //8//
GE07bhg4c15u:411: asmin kāle karṣatīty ucyate śarīram iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:412_0: yad yadotkrāmati bahir nirgacchatīśvaro dehendriya-saṃghātasya svāmī jīvas tadā yato
GE07bhg4c15u:412_1: dehād utkrāmati tato manaḥ-ṣaṣṭhānīndriyāṇi karṣatīti dvitīya-pādasya prathamam anvaya
GE07bhg4c15u:414: kintu yad yadā ca pūrvasmāc charīrāntaram avāpnoti tadaitāni manaḥ-ṣaṣṭhāīndriyāṇi gṛhītvā saṃyāty api samyak punar āgamana-rāhityena gacchaty api /
GE07bhg4c15u:415: śarīre saty evendriya-grahaṇe dṛṣṭāntaḥ - āśayāt kusumādeḥ sthānād gandhān gandhātmakān sūkṣmān aṃśān gṛhītvā yathā vāyur vāti tadvat //8//
GE07bhg4c15u:417: tāny akṛṣya kiṃ karotīty apekṣāyām āha śarīram iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:419: yac ca yasmāc ca śarīrād utkrāmati niṣkrāmati,
GE07bhg4c15u:420_0: īśvaro dehendriyādi-svāmī jīvaḥ tasmāt tatra etānīndriyāṇi bhūta-sūkṣmaiḥ saha gṛhītvaiva
GE07bhg4c15u:420_1: saṃyāti vāyur gandhāni iveti vāyur yathāśayād gandhāśrayāt srak-candanādeḥ sakāśāt
GE07bhg4c15u:420_2: sūkṣmāvayavaiḥ saha gandhān gṛhītvānyatra yāti tadvad ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:421: baladevaḥ : jīva-loke sthita indriyāṇi karṣati ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c15u:423: īśvaraḥ śarīrendriyāṇaṃ svāmī jīvo yad yadā pūrva-śarīrād anyac charīram avāpnoti,
GE07bhg4c15u:425: tadaitānīndriyāṇi bhūta-sūkṣmaiḥ saha gṛhṭivā yāty āśayāt puṣpa-kośād gandhān gṛhītvā vāyur iva sa yathānyatra yāti tadvat //8//
GE07bhg4c15u:426: śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca /
GE07bhg4c15u:428: śrīdharaḥ : tāny evendriyāṇi darśayan yad arthaṃ gṛhītvā gacchati tad āha śrotram iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:430: tāny adhiṣṭāyāśritya śabdādīn viṣayān ayaṃ jīva upabhuṅkte //9//
GE07bhg4c15u:432: tāny evendriyāṇi darśayan yad arthaṃ gṛhītvā gacchati tad āha śrotram iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:433: śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca /
GE07bhg4c15u:434: ca-kārāt karmendriyāṇi prāṇaṃ ca manaś ca ṣaṣṭham adhiṣṭhāyaivāśrityaiva viṣayān śabdādīn ayaṃ jīva upasevate bhuṅkte //9//
GE07bhg4c15u:436: tatra gatvā kiṃ karotīty ata āha śrotram iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:437: śrotrādīnīndriyāṇi manaś cādhiṣṭhāyāśritya viṣayān śabdādīn upabhuṅkte //9//
GE07bhg4c15u:438: baladevaḥ : tāni gṛhītvā kim arthaṃ yāti /
GE07bhg4c15u:440: śrotrādīni samanaskāny adhiṣṭhāyāśrityāyaṃ jīvo viṣayān śabdādīn upabhuṅkte /
GE07bhg4c15u:442: ca-śabdāt karmendriyāṇi ca pañca prāṇāṃś cādhiṣṭhāye ty avagamyam //9//
GE07bhg4c15u:445: utkrāmantaṃ sthitaṃ vāpi bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitam /
GE07bhg4c15u:447: śrīdharaḥ : nanu kārya-kāraṇa-saṅghāta-vyatirekeṇa evambhūtam ātmānaṃ sarve 'pi kiṃ na paśyanti /
GE07bhg4c15u:449: utkrāmantaṃ dehād dehāntaraṃ gacchantaṃ tasminn eva dehe sthitaṃ vā viṣayān bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitam indriyādi-yuktaṃ jīvaṃ vimūḍhā nānupaśyanti nālokayanti /
GE07bhg4c15u:450: jñānam eva cakṣur yeṣāṃ te vivekinaḥ paśyanti //10//
GE07bhg4c15u:452: evaṃ deha-gataṃ darśana-yogayam api dehāt utkrāmantam iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:457: evaṃ sarvāsv avasthāsu darśana-yogyam apy enaṃ vimūḍhā dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-viṣaya-bhoga-vāsanākṛṣṭa-cetastayātmānātma-vivekāyogyā nānupaśyanti /
GE07bhg4c15u:458: aho kaṣṭaṃ vartata ity ajñān anukrośati bhagavān /
GE07bhg4c15u:459: ye tu pramāṇa-janita-jñāna-cakṣuṣo vivekinas ta eva paśyanti //10//
GE07bhg4c15u:461: nanu yamād dehān niṣkrāmati yasmin dehe vā tiṣṭhati tatra sthitvā vā yathā bhogān bhuṅkte ity evaṃ viśeṣaṃ nopalabhāmahe /
GE07bhg4c15u:463: sthitaṃ dehāntare vartamānaṃ ca viṣayān bhuñjānaṃ ca guṇānvitam indiryādi-sahitaṃ vimūḍhā avivekinaḥ jñāna-cakṣuṣo vivekinaḥ //10//
GE07bhg4c15u:464: baladevaḥ : evaṃ śarīrasthatvenānubhavayogyam avivekinas tam ātmānaṃ nānubhavantīty āha ud iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:465_0: śarīrād utkrāmantaṃ tatraiva sthitaṃ vā sthitvā viṣayān bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitaṃ sukha-duḥkha-mohair
GE07bhg4c15u:465_1: indiryādibhir vānvitaṃ yuktam anubhava-yogyam apy ātmānaṃ vimūḍhāś cirantana-jñāna-cakṣuṣo
GE07bhg4c15u:469: yatanto yoginaś cainaṃ paśyanty ātmany avasthitam /
GE07bhg4c15u:471: śrīdharaḥ : durjñeyaś cāyaṃ yato vivekiṣv api kecit paśyanti kecin na paśyantīty āha yatanta iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:472: yatanto dhyānādibhiḥ prayatamānā yoginaḥ kecid enam ātmānam ātmani dehe 'vasthitaṃ viviktaṃ paśyanti /
GE07bhg4c15u:473: śāstrābhyāsādibhiḥ prayatnaṃ kurvāṇā apy akṛtātmāno 'viśuddha-cittā ata evācetaso manda-mataya enaṃ na paśyanti //11//
GE07bhg4c15u:475: paśyanti jñāna-cakṣuṣa ity etad vivṛṇoti yatanta iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:476: ātmani sva-buddhāv avasthitaṃ pratiphalitam enam ātmānam yatanto dhyānādibhiḥ prayatamānā yogina eva paśyanti /
GE07bhg4c15u:478: yatamānā apy akṛtātmāno yajñādibhir aśodhitāntaḥ-karaṇā ata evācetaso viveka-śūnyā nainaṃ paśyantīti vimūḍhā nānupaśyantīty etad vivaraṇam //11//
GE07bhg4c15u:480: te ca vivekino yatamānā yogina evety āha yatanta iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:482: baladevaḥ : jñāna-cakṣuṣaḥ paśyanti ity etad vivṛṇvan durjñānatāṃ tasyāh yatanta iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:483: kecid yogino yatamānāḥ śravaṇādy-upāyān anutiṣṭhanta ātmani śarīre 'vasthitam enam ātmānaṃ paśyanti /
GE07bhg4c15u:484: kecid yatamānā apy akṛtātmāno 'nirmala-cittā ato 'vacetaso 'nudita-viveka-jñānā enaṃ na paśyantīti durjñeyam ātma-tattvam ity arthaḥ //11//
GE07bhg4c15u:488: yac candramasi yac cāgnau tat tejo viddhi māmakam //12//
GE07bhg4c15u:489: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ na tad bhāsayate sūrya ity ādinā pārameśvaraṃ paraṃ dhāmoktam /
GE07bhg4c15u:491: tatra ca saṃsāriṇo 'bhāvam āśaṅkya saṃsāri-svarūpaṃ dehādi-vyatiriktaṃ darśitam /
GE07bhg4c15u:492: idānīṃ tad eva pārameśvaraṃ rūpam ananta-śaktitvena nirūpayati yad ity ādi-caturbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:493: ādiyādiṣu sthitaṃ yad aneka-prakāraṃ tejo viśvaṃ prakāśayati tat sarvaṃ tejo madīyam eva jānīhi //12//
GE07bhg4c15u:495_0: idānīṃ yat padaṃ sarvāvabhāsana-kṣamā apy ādityādayo bhāsayituṃ na kṣamante yat-prāptāś
GE07bhg4c15u:495_1: ca mumukṣavaḥ punaḥ saṃsārāya nāvartante yasya ca padasyopādi-bhedam anu vidhīyamānā
GE07bhg4c15u:495_2: jīvā ghaṭākāśādaya ivākāśasya kalpitāṃśā mṛṣaiva saṃsāram anubhavanti tasya padasya
GE07bhg4c15u:495_4: iti prāg uktaṃ vivarītuṃ caturbhiḥ ślokair ātmano vibhūti-saṃkṣepam āha bhagavān yad iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:496: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ nemā vidyuto bhānti kuto 'yam agniḥ [KaṭhU 2.2.15] ity ādinā /
GE07bhg4c15u:497: tam eva bhāntam anubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti [KaṭhU 2.2.15] iti śruty-artham anena vyākhyāyate /
GE07bhg4c15u:498: yad āditya-gataṃ tejaś caitnyātmakaṃ jyotir yac candramasi yac cāgnau sthitaṃ tejo jagad akhilam
GE07bhg4c15u:499: avabhāsayate tat tejo māmakaṃ madīyaṃ viddhi /
GE07bhg4c15u:500: yadyapi sthāvara-jaṅgameṣu samānaṃ caitanyātmakaṃ jyotis tathāpi sattvotkarṣeṇādityādīnām utkarṣāt tatraivāvistarāṃ caitanya-jyotir iti tair viśeṣyate yad āditya-gatam ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c15u:501: yathā tulye 'pi mukha-saṃnidhāne kāṣṭha-kuḍyādau na mukham āvirbhavati /
GE07bhg4c15u:502_0: ādarśādau ca svacche svacchatare ca tāratamyenāvirbhavati tadvad yad āditya-gataṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:502_1: teja ity uktvā punas tat tejo viddhi māmakam iti tejo-grahaṇād yad ādityādi-gataṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:502_2: tejaḥ prakāśaḥ para-prakāśa-samarthaṃ sita-bhāsvaraṃ rūpaṃ jagad akhilaṃ rūpavad
GE07bhg4c15u:503: evaṃ yac candramasi yac cāgnau jagad-avabhāsakaṃ tejas tan māmākaṃ viddhīti vibhūti-kathanāya dvitīyo 'py artho draṣṭavyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:504: anyathā tan māmakaṃ viddhīty etāvad brūyāt tejo-grahaṇam antareṇaiveti bhāvaḥ //12//
GE07bhg4c15u:506: tad evaṃ jīvasya baddhāvasthāyāṃ yat yat prāpya-vastu tatrāham eva sūrya-candrādy-ātmakaḥ sann upakaromīty āha yad iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:507_0: āditya-sthitaṃ teja eva udaya-parvate prātar uditya jīvasya dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-bhoga-sādhana-karma-pravartanārthaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:507_1: jagad bhāsayata evaṃ ca yac candramasi aganau ca tat tad akhilaṃ māmakam eva /
GE07bhg4c15u:509: tat tejasa eva tat-tad-vibhūtir iti bhāvaḥ //12//
GE07bhg4c15u:510: baladevaḥ : atha mad-aṃśasya jīvasya saṃsāra-raktasya mumukṣoś ca bhoga-mokṣa-sādhanam aham eveti bhāvenāha yad iti caturbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:511: āditye sthitaṃ yat tejo yac candre 'gnau ca sthitaṃ sat sarvaṃ jagat prakāśayati,
GE07bhg4c15u:513: uditena sūryeṇa jvalitena ca vahninādṛṣṭa-bhoga-sādhanāni karmāṇi niṣpadyante /
GE07bhg4c15u:515: uditena candreṇa cauṣadhi-poṣa-tāpa-śānti-jyotsnāvihārās tathābhūtā bhavantīti teṣāṃ tat-tat-sādhakaṃ tejo mat-tejo-vibhūtir ity arthaḥ //12//
GE07bhg4c15u:516: gām āviśya ca bhūtāni dhārayāmy aham ojasā /
GE07bhg4c15u:517: puṣṇāmi cauṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ somo bhūtvā rasātmakaḥ //13//
GE07bhg4c15u:519: gāṃ pṛthvīm ojasā balenādhiṣṭhāyāham eva carācarāṇi bhūtāni dhārayāmi /
GE07bhg4c15u:520: aham eva rasamayaḥ somo bhūtvā brīhy-ādy-auṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ saṃvardhayāmi //13//
GE07bhg4c15u:522: gāṃ pṛthivīm pṛthivī-devatā-rūpeṇāviśyaujasā nijena balena pṛthivīṃ dhūli-muṣṭi-tulyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya bhūtāni pṛthivyādheyāni vastūny aham eva dhārayāmi /
GE07bhg4c15u:523: anyathā pṛthivī sikatā-muṣṭivad viśīryatādho nimajjed vā /
GE07bhg4c15u:524: yena dyaur ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḍhā [YajuḥK 1.8.5,
GE07bhg4c15u:526: sa dādhāra pṛthivīm [Ṛk 8.7.3.1] iti ca hiraṇyagarbha-bhāvāpannaṃ bhagavantam evāha /
GE07bhg4c15u:527: kiṃ ca, rasātmakaḥ sarva-rasa-svabhāvaḥ somo bhūtvauṣadhīḥ sarvā brīhi-yavādyāḥ pṛthivyāṃ jātā aham eva puṣṇāmi puṣṭimatī rasa-svādumatīś ca karomi //13//
GE07bhg4c15u:529: gāṃ pṛthvīm ojasā sva-śaktyāviśyādhiṣṭhāyāham eva carācarāṇi bhūtāni dhārayāmi /
GE07bhg4c15u:530: tathāham evāmṛta-rasamayaḥ somo bhūtvā brīhy-ādy-auṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ saṃvardhayāmi //13//
GE07bhg4c15u:531: baladevaḥ : gām iti pāṃśu-muṣṭi-tulyāṃ gāṃ pṛthivīm ojasā sva-śaktyāviśya dṛḍhīkṛtya bhūtāni sthira-carāṇi dhārayāmi /
GE07bhg4c15u:532: mantra-varṇaś caivam āha -- yena dyaur ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḍhā [Ṛk 8.7.3.1] iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:534: tathāham eva rasātmakaḥ somo 'mṛtamayaś candro bhūtvā sarvā auṣadhīr nikhilā brīhy-ādyāḥ puṣṇāmi /
GE07bhg4c15u:536: tathā ca bhūmiloke sthitasya jīvasya vividha-prāsāda-bāṭikā-taḍāgādi-krīḍā-sthānāni nirmāya nānā-rasān bhuñjānasya tat-tat-sādhanam aham eveti //13//
GE07bhg4c15u:539: ahaṃ vaiśvānaro bhūtvā prāṇināṃ deham āśritaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:542_0: aham īśvara eva vaiśvānaro jaṭharāgnir bhūtvā prāṇināṃ dehasyāntaḥ praviśya prānāpānābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:542_1: ca tad-uddīpakābhyāṃ sahitaḥ prāṇibhir bhuktaṃ bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ lehyaṃ coṣyaṃ ceti
GE07bhg4c15u:543: tatra yad dantair avakhaṇḍyāvakhaṇḍya bhakṣyate pūpādi tad bhakṣyam /
GE07bhg4c15u:544: yat tu kevalaṃ jihvayā viloḍya nigīryate pāyasādi tad bhojyam /
GE07bhg4c15u:545: yaj jihvāyāṃ nikṣipya rasāsvādena kramaśo nigīryate dravībhūtaṃ guḍādi tal lehyam /
GE07bhg4c15u:546: yat tu daṃṣṭrādibhir niṣpīḍya sārāṃśaṃ nigīryāvaśiṣṭaṃ tyajyata ikṣu-daṇḍādi tac coṣyam iti caturvidho 'sya bhedaḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c15u:549_0: aham īśvara eva vaiśvānaro jaṭharo 'gnir bhūtvā ayam agnir vaiśvānaro yo 'yam antaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:549_1: puruṣe yenedam annaṃ pacyate yad idam adyate [BAU 5.9.1] ity ādi śruti-pratipāditaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:549_2: san prāṇināṃ sarveṣāṃ deham āśrito 'ntaḥ praviṣṭaḥ prānāpānābhyāṃ tad-uddīpakābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:549_3: saṃyuktaḥ saṃdhukṣitaḥ san pacāmi prāṇibhir bhuktam annaṃ caturvidham bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:550: tatra yad dantair avakhaṇḍyāvakhaṇḍya bhakṣyate pūpādi tad bhakṣyam /
GE07bhg4c15u:551: yat tu kevalaṃ jihvayā viloḍya nigīryate sūpaudanādi tad bhojyam /
GE07bhg4c15u:552: yaj jihvāyāṃ nikṣipya rasāsvādena nigīryate kiṃcid dravībhūtaṃ guḍa-rasālā-śikhariṇy-ādi tal lehyam /
GE07bhg4c15u:553: yat tu dantair niṣpīḍya rasāṃśaṃ nigīryāvaśiṣṭaṃ tyajyate yathekṣu-daṇḍādi tac coṣyam iti bhedaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:554: / bhoktā yaḥ so 'gnri vaiśvānaro yad bhojyam annaṃ sa somas tad etad ubhayam agnīṣomau sarvam iti dhyāyato 'nna-doṣa-lepo na bhavatīty api draṣṭavyam //14//
GE07bhg4c15u:556: vaiśvānaro jaṭharānalaḥ prāṇāpānābhyāṃ tad uddīpakābhyāṃ sahitaś caturvidhaṃ bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ lehyaṃ coṣyam /
GE07bhg4c15u:560: baladevaḥ : bhogyānām annādīnāṃ pāka-hetuś cāham evety āha aham iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:561_0: vaiśvānaro jaṭharāgnis tac-charīrako bhūtvā prāṇināṃ sarveṣāṃ deham udaram āśritaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:561_1: prānāpānābhyāṃ tad-uddīpakābhyāṃ samāyuktaś ca sann ahaṃ tair bhuktaṃ caturvidham
GE07bhg4c15u:562: śrutiś caivam āha ayam agnir vaiśvānaro yo 'yam antaḥ puruṣe yenedaṃ annaṃ pacyate ity ādinā /
GE07bhg4c15u:563: tathā cāham eva jāṭharāgni-śarīras tad-upakārīty evam āha sūtrakāraḥ -- śabdādibhyo 'ntaḥ pratiṣṭhānāc ca ity ādinā /
GE07bhg4c15u:564: annasya cāturvidhyaṃ ca bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ lehyaṃ cūṣyaṃ ceti bhedāt /
GE07bhg4c15u:576: vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva vedyo
GE07bhg4c15u:578: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca sarvasya prāni-jātasya hṛdi samyag-antaryāmi-rūpeṇa praviṣṭo 'ham /
GE07bhg4c15u:579: ataś ca matta eva hetoḥ prāṇi-mātrasya pūrvānbhūtārtha-viṣayā smṛtir bhavati /
GE07bhg4c15u:582: vedaiś ca sarvais tat-tad-devatādi-rūpeṇāham eva vedyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:585: veda-vid eva ca vedārtha-vid apy aham eva //15//
GE07bhg4c15u:587: sarvasya brahmādi-sthāvarāntasya prāṇi-jātasyāham ātmā san hṛdi buddhau saṃniviṣtaḥ sa eṣa iha praviṣṭaḥ [BAU 1.4.7] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:588: anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāma-rūpe vyākaravāṇi [ChāU 6.3.2] iti ca /
GE07bhg4c15u:589: ato matta ātmana eva hetoḥ prāṇi-jātasya yathānurūpaṃ smṛtir etaj janmani pūrvānubhūtārtha-viṣayā vṛttir yogināṃ ca janmāntarānubhūtārtha-viṣayāpi /
GE07bhg4c15u:590: tathā matta eva jñānaṃ viṣayendriya-saṃyogajaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c15u:592: evaṃ kāma-krodha-śokādi-vyākula-cetasām apohanaṃ ca smṛti-jñānayor apāyaś ca matta eva bhavati /
GE07bhg4c15u:593: evaṃ svasya jīva-rūpatām uktvā brahma-rūpatām āha - vedaiś ca sarvair indrādi-devatā-prakāśakair api aham eva vedyaḥ sarvātmatvāt /
GE07bhg4c15u:599: eṣa u hy eva sarve devāḥ iti ca śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:601: na kevalam etāvad eva veda-vid eva cāhaṃ karma-kāṇḍopāsanā-kāṇḍa-jñāna-kāṇḍātmaka-mantra-brāhmaṇa-rūpa-sarva-vedārtha-vic cāham eva /
GE07bhg4c15u:602: ataḥ sādhūktaṃ brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham [Gītā 14.27] ity ādi //15//
GE07bhg4c15u:604: yathaiva jaṭhare jaṭharāgnir ahaṃ tathaiva sarvasya carācarasya hṛdi sanniviṣṭo buddhi-tattva-rūpo 'ham eva /
GE07bhg4c15u:605: yato matto buddhi-tattvād eva pūrvānubhūtārtha-viṣayānusmṛtir bhavati /
GE07bhg4c15u:606: tathā viṣayendriya-yogajaṃ jñānaṃ ca apohanaṃ smṛti-jñānayor apagamaś ca bhavatīti /
GE07bhg4c15u:607: jīvasya bandhāvasthāyāṃ svasyopakārakatvam uktvā mokṣāvasthāyāṃ yat prāpyaṃ tatrāpy upakāratvam āha vedair iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:608: veda-vyāsa-dvārā vedānta-kṛd aham eva yato vedavid vedārtha-tattva-jño 'ham eva matto 'nyo vedārthaṃ na jānātīty arthaḥ //15//
GE07bhg4c15u:609: baladevaḥ : prāṇināṃ jñānājñāna-hetuś cāham evety āha sarvasya ceti /
GE07bhg4c15u:610: tayoḥ soma-vaiśvānarayoḥ sarvasya ca prāṇi-vṛndasya hṛdi nikhila-pravṛtti-hetu-jñānodaya-dehe 'ham eva niyāmakatvena sanniviṣṭaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:613: ato matta eva sarvasya smṛtiḥ pūṛvānubhūta-vastu-viṣayānusandhi-jñānaṃ ca viṣayendriya-sannikarṣa-janyaṃ jāyate /
GE07bhg4c15u:614: tayor apohanaṃ pramoṣaś ca matto bhavati /
GE07bhg4c15u:615: evam uktaṃ uddhavena tvatto jñānaṃ hi jīvānāṃ pramoṣas tatra śaktitaḥ iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:616: evaṃ sāṃsārika-bhoga-sādhanatāṃ svasyoktvā mokṣa-sādhanatām āha vedaiś ceti /
GE07bhg4c15u:617: sarvair nikhilair vedair aham eva sarveśvaraḥ sarva-śaktimān kṛṣṇo vedyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:618: yo 'sau sarvair vedair gīyate iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:619: atra karma-kāṇḍena paramparayā jñāna-kāṇḍena tu sākṣād iti bodhyam /
GE07bhg4c15u:620: katham evaṃ pratyetavyam iti cet tatrāha vedānta-kṛd aham eveti /
GE07bhg4c15u:621: vedānām anto 'rtha-nirṇayas tat-kṛd aham eva bādarāyaṇātmanā /
GE07bhg4c15u:622: evam āha sūtra-kāraḥ -- ta tu samanvayāt [Vs 1.1.4] ity ādibhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:624: tatrāha vedavid eva cāham ity aham eva vedavid iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:625: bādarāyaṇaḥ san yam artham ahaṃ niraṇaiṣaṃ sa eva vedārthas tato 'nyathā tu bhrānti-vijṛmbhita iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:626: tathā ca mokṣa-pradasya sarveśvara-tattvasya vedair abodhanād aham eva mokṣa-sādhanam //15//
GE07bhg4c15u:627: dvāv imau puruṣau loke kṣaraś cākṣara eva ca /
GE07bhg4c15u:629: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ tad dhāma paramaṃ mameti yad uktaṃ svakīyaṃ sarvottama-svarūpaṃ tad darśayati dvāv iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:630: kṣaraś cākṣaraś ceti dvāv imau puruṣau loke prasiddhau /
GE07bhg4c15u:631: tāv evāha tatra kṣaraḥ puruṣo nāma sarvāṇi bhūtāni brahmādi-sthāvarāntāni śarīrāṇi /
GE07bhg4c15u:634: parvata iva deheṣu naśyatsv api nirvikāratayā tiṣṭhatīti kūṭashtaś cetano bhoktā /
GE07bhg4c15u:635: sa tv akṣaraḥ puruṣa ity ucyate vivekibhiḥ //16//
GE07bhg4c15u:637_1: nirupādhikaṃ śuddham ātmānaṃ pratipādayati kṛpayā bhagavān arjunāya dvāv imāv iti tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:638: dvāv imau pṛthag-rāśī-kṛtau puruṣau puruṣopādhitvena puruṣa-śabda-vyapadeśyau loke saṃsāre /
GE07bhg4c15u:639: kau tau ? ity āha kṣarākṣara eva ca kṣaratīti kṣaro vināśī kārya-rāśir ekaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:640: na kṣaratīty akṣaro vināśa-rahitaḥ kṣarākhyasya puruṣasyotpatti-bījaṃ bhagavato māyā-śaktir dvitīyaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:641: tau puruṣau vyācaṣṭe svayam eva bhagavān kṣaraḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni samastaṃ kārya-jātam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:644: sthitaḥ kūṭastho bhagavān māyā-śakti-rūpaḥ kāraṇopādhiḥ saṃsāra-bījatvenānantyād akṣara ucyate /
GE07bhg4c15u:645: kecit tu kṣara-śabdenācetana-vargam uktvā kūṭastho 'kṣara ucyata ity anena jīvam āhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:648: tasmāt kṣarākṣara-śabdābhyāṃ kārya-kāraṇopādhī ubhāv api jaḍāv evocyete ity eva yuktam //16//
GE07bhg4c15u:650: yasmād aham eva vedavit tasmāt sarva-vedārtha-niṣkarṣaṃ saṅkṣepeṇa bravīmi śṛṇu ity āha dvāv imāv iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:651: loke caturdaśa-bhuvanātmake jaḍa-prapañce imau dvau puruṣau cetanau staḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:652: kau tāv ata āha kṣaraṃ sva-svarūpāt kṣarati vicyuto bhavatīti kṣaro jīvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:654: etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti /
GE07bhg4c15u:656: akṣaraṃ brahma paramam iti smṛteś ca akṣara-śabdo brahma-vācaka eva dṛṣṭaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:657_0: kṣarākṣarayor arthaṃ punar viśadayati sarvāṇi bhūtāni eko jīva eva anādy-avidyayā
GE07bhg4c15u:657_1: svarūpa-vicyutaḥ san karma-paratantraḥ samaṣṭy-ātmako brahmādi-sthāvarāntāni bhūtāni bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:659: dvitīya-puruṣo 'kṣaras tu kūṭastha ekenaiva svarūpeṇavicyutimatā sarva-kāla-vyāpī
GE07bhg4c15u:660: / ekarūpatayā tu yaḥ kāla-vyāpī sa kūṭasthaḥ ity amaraḥ //16//
GE07bhg4c15u:661: baladevaḥ : bādarāyaṇātmanā nirṇītaṃ vedārthaṃ saṅkṣipyāha dvāv iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:662: lokyate tattvam anena iti vyutpatter loke vede /
GE07bhg4c15u:663: dvau puruṣau prathitau imāv iti pramāṇa-siddhatā sūcyate /
GE07bhg4c15u:664: tau kāv ity āha kṣaraś ceti /
GE07bhg4c15u:666: akṣaras tad-abhāvād ekāvastho mukto 'cid-viyogaika-dharma-sambandhād ekatvena nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:667: kṣarākṣarau sphuṭayati sarvāṇi brahmādi-stambāntāni bhūtāni kṣaraḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:671: idaṃ jñānam upāśritya ity ādeś ca bahutva-saṅkhyākaḥ saḥ //16//
GE07bhg4c15u:674: uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:675: yo loka-trayam āviśya bibharty avyaya īśvaraḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c15u:676: śrīdharaḥ : yad artham etau lakṣitau tam āha uttama iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:677: etābhyāṃ kṣarāksarābhyām anyo vilakṣaṇas tu uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:678: vailakṣaṇyam evāha paramaś cāsāv ātmā cety udāhṛtaḥ uktaḥ śrutibhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:680: paramatvenākṣarāc cetanād bhoktur vilakṣaṇa ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:682: ya īśvara īśana-śīlo 'vyayaś ca nirvikāra eva san loka-trayaṃ kṛsnam āviśya bibharti pālayati //17//
GE07bhg4c15u:684: ābhyāṃ kṣarākṣarābhyāṃ vilakṣaṇaḥ kṣarākṣaropādhi-dvaya-doṣeṇāspṛṣṭo nitya-śuddha-buddha-mukta-svabhāvaḥ uttama iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:685: uttama utkṛṣṭatamaḥ puruṣas tv anyonya evātyanta-vilakṣaṇa ābhyāṃ kṣarākṣarābhyāṃ jaḍa-rāśibhyām ubhaya-bhāsakas tṛtīyaś cetana-rāśir ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:686_1: 'vidyā-kalpitātmabhyaḥ paramaḥ prakṛṣṭo 'kalpito brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhety ukta
GE07bhg4c15u:686_2: ātmā ca sarva-bhūtānāṃ pratyak-cetana ity ataḥ paramātmety uktao vedānteṣu /
GE07bhg4c15u:687: yaḥ paramātmā loka-trayam bhūr-bhuvaḥ-svar-ākhyaṃ sarvaṃ jagad iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c15u:688: āviśya svakīyayā māyā-śaktyādhiṣṭhāya bibharti sattā-sphūrti-pradānena dhārayati poṣayati ca / kīdṛśaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:689: ? avyayaḥ sarva-vikāra-śūnya īśvaraḥ sarvasya niyantā nārāyaṇaḥ sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ paramātmety udāhṛta ity anvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:692: jñānibhir upāsyaṃ brahmoktvā yogibhir upāsyaṃ paramātmānam āha uttama iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:694: jñānibhyaś cādhiko yogīty upāsaka-vaiśiṣṭyād evopāsya-vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca labhyate /
GE07bhg4c15u:695: paramātma-tattvam eva darśayati ya īśvara īsana-śīlo 'vyayo nirvikāra eva san loka-trayaṃ kṛtsnam āviśya bibharti dhārayati pālayati ca //17//
GE07bhg4c15u:696: baladevaḥ : yad arthaṃ dvau puruṣau nirūpitau tam āha uttama iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:697: anyaḥ kṣarākṣarābhyāṃ na tu tayor evaikaḥ saṅkalpa iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:700: na caitaj jagad-vidhāraṇa-pālana-rūpam īśanaṃ baddhasya jīvasya karmāsambhavāt /
GE07bhg4c15u:701: na ca muktasya jagad-vyāpāra-varjam iti pratiṣedhāc ca //17//
GE07bhg4c15u:704: yasmāt kṣaram atīto 'ham akṣarād api cottamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:705: ato 'smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ //18//
GE07bhg4c15u:706: śrīdharaḥ : evam uktaṃ puruṣottamatvam ātmano nāma-nirvacanena darśayati yasmādi it /
GE07bhg4c15u:707: yasmāt kṣaraṃ jaḍa-vargam atikrānto 'haṃ nityam uktatvāt /
GE07bhg4c15u:708: akṣarāc cetana-vargād apy uttamaś ca niyantṛtvāt /
GE07bhg4c15u:709: ato loke vede ca puruṣottama iti prathitaḥ prakhyāto 'smi /
GE07bhg4c15u:710: tathā ca śrutiḥ - sa eva sarvasyeśānaḥ sarvasyādhipatiḥ sarvam idaṃ praśāstīty ādi //18//
GE07bhg4c15u:712_0: idānīṃ yathā-vyākhyāteśvarasya kṣarākṣara-vilakṣaṇasya puruṣottama ity etat prasiddha-nāma-nirvacanenedṛśaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:712_1: parameśvaro 'ham evety ātmānaṃ darśayati bhagavān brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāhaṃ [Gītā
GE07bhg4c15u:712_2: 14.27] tad dhāma paramaṃ mama [Gītā 15.6] ityādi prāg-ukta-nija-mahima-nirdhāraṇāya yasmād iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:713_0: yasmāt kṣaraṃ kāryatvena vināśinaṃ māyāmayaṃ saṃsāra-vṛklṣam aśvatthākhyam atīto
GE07bhg4c15u:713_1: 'tikrānto 'haṃ parameśvaro 'kṣarād api māyākhyād avyākṛtād akṣarāt parataḥ para iti
GE07bhg4c15u:714: ataḥ kṣarākṣarābhyāṃ puruṣotpādhibhyām adhyāsena puruṣa-pada-vyapadśyābhyām uttamatvād asmi bhavāmi loke vede ca prathitaḥ prakhyātaḥ puruṣottama
GE07bhg4c15u:715: iti sa uttamaḥ puruṣa iti veda udāhṛta eva loke ca kavi-kāvyādau harir yathaikaḥ puruṣottamaḥ smṛtaḥ ity ādi prasiddham /
GE07bhg4c15u:719: nārāyaṇasya mahimā na hi mānam eti //
GE07bhg4c15u:725: yogibhir upāsyaṃ paramātmānam uktvā bhaktair upāsyaṃ bhagavantaṃ vadan bhagavattve 'pi svasya kṛṣṇa-svarūpasya puruṣottama iti nāma vyācakṣāṇaḥ sarvotkarṣam āha yasmād iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:726: kṣaraṃ puruṣaṃ jīvātmānam atītaḥ akṣarāt puruṣāt brahmata uttamād avikārāt paramātmanaḥ puruṣād apy uttamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:732: ca-kārād bhagavato vaikuṇṭha-nāthādeḥ sakāśād api ete cāṃśa-kalāḥ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṇas tu bhagavān svayam iti sūtokter aham uttamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:733: atra yadyapy ekam eva sac-cid-ānanda-svarūpaṃ vastu brahma-paramātma-bhagavat-śabdair ucyate na tu vastutaḥ svarūpataḥ ko 'pi bhedo 'sti svarūpa-dvayābhāvāt (BhP 6.9.35)
GE07bhg4c15u:735: tad api tat-tad-upāsakānāṃ sādhanataḥ phalataś ca bheda-darśanāt bheda iva vyavahriyate /
GE07bhg4c15u:736: tathā hi brahma-paramātma-bhagavad-upāsakānāṃ krameṇa tat-tat-prāpti-sādhanaṃ jñānaṃ yogo bhaktiś ca /
GE07bhg4c15u:737: phalaṃ ca jñāna-yogayor vastuto mokṣa eva,
GE07bhg4c15u:739: tatra bhaktyā vinā jñāna-yogābhyāṃ naiṣkarmyam apy acyuta-bhāva-varjitaṃ na śobhate [BhP 1.5.12] iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:740: pureha bhūman bahavo 'pi yoginaḥ [BhP 10.14.5] ity ādi-darśanāt na mokṣa iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:741: brahmopāsakaiḥ paramātmopāsakaiḥ sva-sādhya-phala-siddhy-arthaṃ bhagavato bhaktir avaśyaṃ kartavyaiva /
GE07bhg4c15u:742: bhagavad-upāsakas tu sva-sādhya-phala-siddhy-arthaṃ na brahmopāsanāpi paramātmopāsanā kriyate /
GE07bhg4c15u:743: na jñānaṃ na ca vairāgyaṃ prāyaḥ śreyo bhaved iha [BhP 11.20.31] iti,
GE07bhg4c15u:744: yat karmabhir yat tapasā jñāna-vairāgyataś ca yat [BhP 11.20.32] ity ādau -
GE07bhg4c15u:754: ataeva bhagavad-upāsanayā svargāpavarga-premādīni sarva-phalāny eva labdhuṃ śakyante /
GE07bhg4c15u:755: brahma-paramātmopāsanayā tu na premādīnīty ata eva brahma-paramātmābhyāṃ bhagavad-utkarṣaḥ khalu abhede 'py ucyate /
GE07bhg4c15u:756: yathā tejastvenābhede 'pi jyotir dīpāgni-puñjeṣu madhye śītādy-ārti-kṣayād dhetor agni-puñja eva śreṣṭha ucyate /
GE07bhg4c15u:757: tatrāpi bhagavataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇasya tu parama evotkarṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:759: yena brahmopāsanā-paripākato labhyo nirvāṇa-mokṣaḥ sva-dveṣṭṛbhyo 'py agha-bak-jarāsandhādibhyo mahā-pāpibhyo datta iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:760: ataeva brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham ity atra yathāvad eva vyākhyātaṃ śrī-svāmi-caraṇaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:765: tato vāraṃ vāraṃ bhajata kuśalārambha-kṛtinaḥ // iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:769: kṛṣṇāt paraṃ kim api tattvam ahaṃ na jāne // iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:774: ity uktavadbhiḥ kṛṣṇe sarvotkarṣa eva vyavasthāpita ity ataḥ dvāv imau ity ādi śloka-trayasyāsya vyākhyāyām asyām abhyasūyā nāviṣkartavyā /
GE07bhg4c15u:776: baladevaḥ : atha puruṣottama-nāma-nirvacanaṃ svasya tattvam āha yasmād iti uttama utkṛṣṭatamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:777: loke pauruṣeyāgame lokyate vedārtho 'nena iti nirukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:778: vede tāvad eṣa samprasādo 'smāc charīrāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotīrūpaṃ sampadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate,
GE07bhg4c15u:779: sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ ity ādau prathitaḥ yat paraṃ jyotiḥ samprasādenopasampannaṃ sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ paramātmetiy arthaḥ / loke ca -
GE07bhg4c15u:787: yo mām evam asaṃmūḍho jānāti puruṣottamam /
GE07bhg4c15u:788: sa sarva-vid bhajati māṃ sarva-bhāvena bhārata //19//
GE07bhg4c15u:789: śrīdharaḥ : evambhūteśvarasya jñātuḥ phalam āha ya iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:790: evam ukta-prakāreṇāsammūḍho niścita-matiḥ san yo māṃ puruṣottamaṃ jānāti sa sarva-bhāvena sarva-prakāreṇa mām eva bhajati /
GE07bhg4c15u:793: evaṃ nāma-nirvacana-jñāne phalam āha yo mām iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:794_0: yo mām īśvaram evaṃ yathokta-nāma-nirvacanenāsaṃmūḍho manuṣya evāyaṃ kaścit kṛṣṇa
GE07bhg4c15u:794_1: iti saṃmoha-varjito jānāty ayam īśvara eveti puruṣottamaṃ prāg vyākhyātaṃ sa māṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:794_2: bhajati sevate sarvavin māṃ sarvātmānaṃ vettīti sa eva sarvajñaḥ sarva-bhāvena prema-lakṣaṇena
GE07bhg4c15u:799: yathoktaṃ brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham iti tad apy upapannataram /
GE07bhg4c15u:805: nanv etasmiṃs tvayā vyavasthāpite 'py arthe vādino vivadanta eva,
GE07bhg4c15u:806: tatra vivadantāṃ te man-māyā-mohitāḥ sādhus tu na muhyatīty āha yo mām iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:808: sa eva sarvavid anadhīta-śāstre 'pi sa sarva-śāstrārtha-tattva-jñaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:809: tad-anyaḥ kilādhītādhyāśita-sarva-śāstre 'pi saṃmūḍhaḥ samyaṅ-mūrkha eveti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:810: tathā ya evaṃ jānāti sa eva māṃ sarvato-bhāvena bhajati /
GE07bhg4c15u:811: tad anye bhajann api na māṃ bhajatīty arthaḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c15u:812: baladevaḥ : tātparya-dyotanāya puruṣottamatva-vettuḥ phalam āha yo mām iti /
GE07bhg4c15u:813: evaṃ mad-ukta-niruktyā na tv aśva-karṇādivat saṃjñā-mātratvena /
GE07bhg4c15u:818: puruṣottamatvajño māṃ sarva-bhāvena sarva-prakāreṇa bhajaty upāste /
GE07bhg4c15u:819: sarva-vedārtha-vettari sarva-bhakty-aṅgānuṣṭhātari ca yo me prasādaḥ sa tasmin bhaved iti me puruṣottamatve sandihānas tv adhīta-sarva-vedo 'py ajñaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:820: sarvathā bhajann apy abhakta iti bhāvaḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c15u:823: iti guhyatamaṃ śāstram idam uktaṃ mayānagha /
GE07bhg4c15u:824: etad buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛta-kṛtyaś ca bhārata //20//
GE07bhg4c15u:826: ity anena saṃkṣepa-prakāreṇa guhyatamam atirahasyaṃ sampūrṇaṃ śāstram eva mayoktam /
GE07bhg4c15u:827: na tu punar viṃśati-ślokam adhyāya-mātraṃ he anagha vyasana-śūnya /
GE07bhg4c15u:828: ata etan mad-uktaṃ śāstraṃ buddhyā buddhimān samyag jñānī syaāt /
GE07bhg4c15u:830: yo 'pi ko 'pi he bhārata tvaṃ kṛta-kṛtyo 'sīti kiṃ vaktavyam iti bhāvaḥ //20//
GE07bhg4c15u:838: iti anena prakāreṇa guhyatamaṃ rahasyatamaṃ sampūrṇaṃ śāstram eva saṃkṣepeṇedam asminn adhyāye mayoktaṃ he 'naghāvyasana /
GE07bhg4c15u:839: etad buddhvānyo 'pi yaḥ kaścid buddhimān ātma-jñānavān syāt kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtyaṃ yena na punaḥ kṛtyāntaraṃ yasyāsti sa kṛtakṛtyaś ca syāt /
GE07bhg4c15u:840: viśiṣṭa-janma-prasūtena brāhmaṇena yat kartavyaṃ tat sarvaṃ bhagavat-tattve vidite kṛtaṃ bhavet na tv anyathā kartavyaṃ parisamāpyate kasyacid ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:841: he bhārata tvaṃ tu mahākula-prasūtaḥ svayaṃ ca vyasana-rahita iti kula-guṇena sva-guṇena caitad buddhvā kṛta-kṛtyo bhaviṣyasīti kim u vaktavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ //20//
GE07bhg4c15u:845: kṛṣṇāt paraṃ kim api tattvam ahaṃ na jāne //1//
GE07bhg4c15u:846: sadā sadānanda-pade nimagnaṃ mano manobhāvam apākaroti /
GE07bhg4c15u:847: gatāgatāyāsam apāsya sadyaḥ parāparātītam upaiti tattvam //2//
GE07bhg4c15u:848: śaivāḥ saurāś ca gāṇeśā vaiṣṇavāḥ śakti-pūjakāḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:849: bhavanti yan-mayāḥ sarve so 'ham asmi paraḥ śivaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c15u:851: na śaknuvanti ye soḍhuṃ te mūḍhā nirayaṃ gatāḥ //4//
GE07bhg4c15u:856: viṃśatyā ślokair ebhir atirahasyaṃ śāstram eva sampūrṇaṃ mayoktam //20//
GE07bhg4c15u:858: kṛṣṇa eva mahotkarṣa ity adhyāyārtha īritaḥ //
GE07bhg4c15u:860: gītāsv ayaṃ pañcadaśaḥ saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām //
GE07bhg4c15u:862: baladevaḥ : athaitad apātreṣv aprakāśyam iti bhāvenāha itīti /
GE07bhg4c15u:863: ity evaṃ saṃkṣepa-rūpaṃ puruṣottamatva-nirūpakam idaṃ triślokī-śāstraṃ tubhyaṃ parama-bhaktāya mayoktam /
GE07bhg4c15u:864: he anagha, tvaāpy apātreṣu naitat prakāśyam iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:867: baddhān muktāc ca yaḥ puṃso bhinnas tad-bhṛt tad-uttamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c15u:868: sa pumān harir eveti prāptaṃ pañcadaśād ataḥ //
